view.premium_desc:
Viewing detailed poll results (who voted for what) is a **Premium Feature**.

To unlock this for 12 hours, simply vote for the bot on Top.gg!

If you don't want to vote you can use the export app/command to get a list of voters but it will not be formatted automatically for you or show option winners, it is just a CSV of the voters.
